content: Since joining ZapCom Group Inc., I have been honing my skills as an Associate Data Scientist. My core competencies lie in developing AI-driven solutions, such as implementing an OCR system using AWS Textract and creating a route optimization system leveraging geospatial data.At ZapCom, our team engineered a chatbot using OpenAI's GPT models, pioneered a clustering module for geospatial coordinate analysis, and developed Flask RESTful APIs for efficient data handling. These initiatives, rooted in my expertise with large language models, artificial intelligence, and Python development, reflect a commitment to innovation and efficiency. Embracing these technologies, I aim to contribute to a culture of continuous learning and collaborative growth.
